document.full_text: aerosmith rocker steven tyler has been in and out of rehab countless times, but don't expect him to appear on "celebrity rehab," the reality tv show about the addiction battles of the vaguely rich and famous.
document.title: aerosmith's steven tyler rips "celebrity rehab"
lines_and_colors: aerosmith rocker steven tyler has been in and out of rehab countless times, but don't expect him to appear on "celebrity rehab," the reality tv show about the addiction battles of the vaguely rich and famous.
